properties.name: Kuh-e-Chehr Mn deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran
properties.description:
Kuh-e-Chehr Mn deposit, Zarrin Rural District, Kharanaq District, Ardakan County, Yazd Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The manganese deposit of Kuh-e-Chehr, northeast of Ardakan, in the Yazd block, consists of the main minerals pyrolusite, cryptomelane, manganosite, limonite, and goethite. The high ratio of Si/Al, Mn/Fe, enrichment of Pb, Sr, Ba, Zn, and depletion of C...
